messages.subject: Re: Introduction/Ohio
messages.msgSnippet: Actually,  I m in Northern KY....just hoping some Buckeye might be fairly close by.  I don t know a lot of unschoolers around here. That s one reason I m
messages.messageBody:
Actually, I'm in Northern KY....just hoping some Buckeye might be fairly
close by. I don't know a lot of unschoolers around here.
That's one reason I'm grateful for this list....the discussion, people
who understand, etc. I'm surrounded by 'schoolers' - public and private -
who often have subtle (and not-so-subtle) digs about how I'm failing my
young 'uns. It's especially strong now with the start of the school year.
One neighbor has the belief that because the required school day in KY is
longer than in OH, the KY school children will end up smarter!!!
Susan in KY
Trying to be patient; hoping to educate by example!
